problems.title: Hollow Square Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print a hollow square pattern of stars of side n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
***
* *
***

Explanation:
A hollow square of side 3 is printed.
hintsList: Print stars for the first and last rows.
For other rows, print star at start and end, spaces in between.
